## TranslationJob.addedItems property

Collection containing the `AddedItem`<!-- -->s that have been added to this Translation Job. The `AddedItem`<!-- -->s represent either an Item that will be translated (for example a Component) or an Item that contains the Items that will be translated (for example a Folder).

**Signature:**

```typescript
get addedItems(): ReadonlyArray<TranslationJobItem> | undefined;
```
